prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, Reed, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:

This piece of music features a Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, Reed, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 2:

This song is composed of a Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, Reed, and Drums, omitting the Guitar.

Style 3:

The instruments used in this song are Synth Pad, Bass, Piano, Reed, and Drums, with no Guitar.
